intro: Pre-build script: mirror notes/, export raw/, generate files.json (notes + source tree).

notes.content:
A pre-build script:
- Mirrors notes/ â†’ public/notes/ for runtime fetch
- Rebuilds public/raw/ and exports source files as raw/*.txt for the Source Viewer
- Generates public/data/files.json combining notes trees + project source tree
- Uses git log timestamps to avoid unreliable CI mtimes
Uses git log timestamps for lastModified because filesystem mtimes are unreliable in CI.
scanDirectory builds both the notes tree and the source code tree; source files are exported as raw/*.txt for fetchability.
